entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
